intro: I base my classes on a case by case basis, I understand that people may carry injuries or limitations that require their position to be modified and their lessons adjusted. No specific level of riding is required nor any specific experience.
testimonial: Sports are about those incredible moments where sheer human will and desire overcomes the odds. These are the moments we remember.
Age is no barrier. With this teacher i pushed my limits
I always felt that my greatest asset was not my physical ability, it was my mental ability.

intro: My approch is based on horse-human relationship, first step is to know each other, learn how to communicate to then gain each other's trust. No 2 people are the same, so I respect individuals time and limits to go foward.
testimonial: Sports are about those incredible moments where sheer human will and desire overcomes the odds. These are the moments we remember.

I always felt that my greatest asset was not my physical ability, it was my mental ability.

intro: Learn how to care for your new horse and everything that comes with them. Teaching you and your horse how to catch, lead and lunge as well as feeding, rugging, floating, hoof care, brushing, saddling, gear care, appropriate yards and more. Create a real bond with your horse or pony.
testimonial: Sports are about those incredible moments where sheer human will and desire overcomes the odds. These are the moments we remember.
